entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:07 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 03:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
